Memories that stay
Taste that lingers
About Us
We are doing more than you expect
Welcome to our hidden gem nestled within Zephyrhills premier golf club. At
Parkway Tavern
, we blend culinary excellence with the serene ambiance of our scenic surroundings. Whether you’re here for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, our commitment to quality and hospitality ensures every visit is memorable.
Burger
Barbecue
Drinks
Parkway Tavern is now under new ownership! Enjoy delicious food, refreshing drinks, and handcrafted cocktails in a warm, inviting atmosphere at Southport Springs Golf & Country Club.
Savor a Journey of Flavors Beyond the Ordinary
Step into a warm, inviting space where every dish is crafted with care. Whether you’re fresh off the course or simply craving something amazing, your next unforgettable meal is waiting.
Fresh Ingredients
Scenic Views
Friendly Atmosphere
Creative Cuisine
Full menu
11:00 am until one hour before closing. Call ahead to place your pick-up order.

Crafted dishes for every moment.
What We Bring to the Table
Download menu
Appetizers
Indulge in our flavorful starters that set the stage for a delightful meal. From savory pierogi & kielbasa to crispy chicken wings with seasoned fries, each dish is crafted to tantalize your taste buds and complement your dining experience.
Main Courses
Our main courses are a testament to culinary craftsmanship. From succulent crab-stuffed grouper to hearty beef lasagna with garlic bread and salad, each dish promises a symphony of flavors served with a side of charm.
Sandwiches & More
Savor the satisfaction of our sandwiches, where classics meet innovation. From the Parmesan chicken sandwich with seasoned fries to gourmet tacos filled with tender beef or chicken, each bite is a celebration of flavor and freshness.
Experience culinary bliss at
Parkway Tavern
. Join us for a meal that promises not just great food, but memories worth savoring
